data.actual_result: The proposal bare doesn't appear correctly, it's necessary to do one space for see it.
data.expected_result: The proposal bar appear correctly when you add the `@`
data.short_description: When you have text and you want to insert a mention in, the proposal bar does not display correctly
data.steps_to_repro: - Launch Discord. - Go to one channel in which you can write. - Write a text - You forgot to insert a mention `@WolfGang1710#6782`, insert it.
